Package ohos.agp.components

Interface SlideDrawer.SlideListener

  • Enclosing class:
    SlideDrawer

    public static interface SlideDrawer.SlideListener
    Listens for SlideDrawer state changes.
    Since:
    5

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onClose​(SlideDrawer drawer, SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction)
      Called when the SlideDrawer state is changed to DrawerState#CLOSE.
      void onMiddle​(SlideDrawer drawer, SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction, SlideDrawer.DrawerState lastState)
      Called when the SlideDrawer state is changed to DrawerState#MIDDLE.
      void onOpen​(SlideDrawer drawer, SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction)
      Called when the SlideDrawer state is changed to DrawerState#OPEN.
      void onSlideChange​(SlideDrawer drawer, SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction, int leftOffset, int topOffset)
      Called when the SlideDrawer position is changed due to a slide.

    • Method Detail

      • onOpen

        void onOpen​(SlideDrawer drawer,
            SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction)
        Called when the SlideDrawer state is changed to DrawerState#OPEN.
        Parameters:
        drawer - Indicates the SlideDrawer where the slide event occurred.
        direction - Indicates the direction of the slide event.
        Since:
        5

      • onMiddle

        void onMiddle​(SlideDrawer drawer,
              SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction,
              SlideDrawer.DrawerState lastState)
        Called when the SlideDrawer state is changed to DrawerState#MIDDLE.
        Parameters:
        drawer - Indicates the SlideDrawer where the slide event occurred.
        direction - Indicates the direction of the slide event.
        lastState - Indicates the last DrawerState before switching to DrawerState#MIDDLE.
        Since:
        5

      • onClose

        void onClose​(SlideDrawer drawer,
             SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction)
        Called when the SlideDrawer state is changed to DrawerState#CLOSE.
        Parameters:
        drawer - Indicates the SlideDrawer where the slide event occurred.
        direction - Indicates the direction of the slide event.
        Since:
        5

      • onSlideChange

        void onSlideChange​(SlideDrawer drawer,
                   SlideDrawer.SlideDirection direction,
                   int leftOffset,
                   int topOffset)
        Called when the SlideDrawer position is changed due to a slide.
        Parameters:
        drawer - Indicates the SlideDrawer where the slide event occurred.
        direction - Indicates the direction of the slide event.
        leftOffset - Indicates the sliding offset from the left side.
        topOffset - Indicates the sliding offset from the top side.
        Since:
        5
